item.title: A brief update on Owncast
item.description: I made a post when I pushed up my initial idea of Owncast to GitHub, but I haven’t posted any status updates to my own website since then. There’s been some significant traction lately, so I wanted to take a moment to write an update. We’ve been making steady progress under the radar with a fantastic group of people who have discovered the project. We knew that once we completed our Owncast web admin feature that we’d let a few more people know about the status of things, since it’s an added level of polish and ease of use that might appeal to people.
